title: (x) Prada.com monospaced grotesque - Akkurat Mono {Florian, Kristian M}
content:
Hi guys:

Here is an interesting monospaced grot that can been seen at Prada.com

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202181810im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Picture1_6503.png)

Do you know what it is?

Thanks

Mikey :-)

author: SuperUltraFabulous

comments.content:

Mikey :-)
